CustomField.formula: Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity' && SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Industrial_Team__c = FALSE && ( Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'MM - Team 8 - AE' || Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'MM - Team 4 - AE' || Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'MM - Team 11 - AE' ) && NOT( OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'COR' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'SEL' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'STR' ) ) ) && ISBLANK(Manager_4__c) && Discount_Approval_Needed__c = TRUE
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met For DiscApprovalNoDir
